Class ShowOnlyAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action

    public class ShowOnlyAction
extends SnifferAction
    For don'tsniff the Agent in the tree, and if necessary redrawing the box of agent with yellow color.
    See Also:
    DoNotSnifferAction, ShowOnlyAction, Serialized Form
